Package ePortfolio

Interface MessageListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuyPanel, GainPanel, SearchPanel, SellPanel, UpdatePanel
public interface MessageListener
listener interface for ePortfolio panels and functions

    Method

    Appends a message to the messages area.

  • Method Details

    • appendMessage

      void appendMessage(String message)
      Appends a message to the messages area.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to append

    • setMessage

      void setMessage(String message)
      Replaces the current content of the messages area with a new message.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to display

    • setFields

      void setFields(String symbol, String name, String price)
      Sets the input fields with specified values. This method is a placeholder to allow integration with other panels or components that might pre-fill fields with specific data.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol to set in the symbol field
      name - the name to set in the name field
      price - the price to set in the price field
